title: If Protesters Really Cared..
body:
They would be spending their time going after the real problem. Criminals...

Not all police are criminals. So make society better by going after and stopping criminals/crime. The beauty of this is, the criminal cops get added to the mix.

You know why we have no cure for Bob Saget's disease? Cause ti doesn't exist. We would be wasting resources on finding a cure for something that doesn't exist. So, cops exist because crime exists, YOU REALLY WANT TO STOP POLICE BRUTALITY!!!!??? Stop the criminals.
